Gas prices were high and the loony tunes said that it was because Bush and Cheney were lining the pockets of their rich oil friends? It just occurred to me, what with Obama running off to another vacation to push to have the 2016 Olympics awarded to Chicago (during the meltdown of a nation which happens to be at war) and all....could not the same thing be said of Obama? I'm sure he DOES still have friends in Chicago, right? No doubt they all hold high positions (he's not rubbing elbows with the garbage men, I'm sure), right?. Would not his friends all benefit greatly by having the Olympics brought to Chicago (something like 50% of the citizens don't even want it anyway)?
